name: 신기록 : A Compendium of Ghosts
description: '신기록 : A Compendium of Ghosts' is a role-playing game based on the webtoon of the same name. Sang returns home as a fully fledged hunter. On his way, he gets caught up in a very strange event. You have to accompany him on his journey to gather clues and puzzle out what is going on.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB
